Apple reported strong growth in global PC shipments, underscoring robust demand for its Mac lineup.
Apple (AAPL) Sees Strong Growth in Global PC Shipments
Positive Sentiment:
Apple is pursuing U.S. broadcasting rights for Formula 1 in a deal reportedly worth $150 million, marking a content expansion

Apple sues Jon Prosser for his iOS 26 YouTube leaks, Prosser responds
Neutral Sentiment:
Apple previewed emoji additions in iOS 26, including Bigfoot and an apple core, maintaining consumer engagement with its mobile software ecosystem.
iOS 26 Emoji Will Include Bigfoot, Apple Core, Distorted Face,
Meta continues to raid Apple’s AI talent, hiring two ex-Apple researchers and luring their former boss with a $200 million package, intensifying the AI talent war.
